desc.en: Focused on offering services to enhance client skills, CreVa is a real company aiming to create value in individuals characteristics.
Focused on managing country-related activities, this platform allows users to create activities associated with specific countries, providing an interactive and informative experience.

My name is Martín García Hervás, I'm a Full Stack Developer, with background experience of over 3 years in logistics and construction. I have worked on projects involving design and development in both Front End and Back End. My Soft-Skills include strong organizational ability, teamwork, and leadership.
